title: Smart Data Models - OutdoorAirConditioner schema
description: Information on OutdoorAirConditioner (maker, model, specification, etc.).

type.description: Property. It must be equal to `OutdoorAirConditioner`.

capacityCooling.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Capacity cooling of this item.

capacityCoolingMax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Max capacity cooling of this item.

capacityCoolingMin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Min capacity cooling of this item.

capacityDefumidificationCooling.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Defumidification capacity when cooling of this item.

capacityDefumidificationMax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Max defumidification capacity of this item.

capacityDefumidificationMin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Min defumidification capacity of this item.

capacityNonHeatStorageCooling.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Non-heat storage cooling capacity of this item.

capacityNonHeatStorageCoolingMax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Max non-heat storage cooling capacity of this item.

capacityHeatStorageCoolingMax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Max heat storage cooling capacity of this item.

capacityNonHeatStorageHeatingMax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Max non-heat storage heating capacity of this item.

capacityHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Capacity heating of this item.

capacityHeatingMax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Max apacity heating of this item.

capacityHeatingMin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Min apacity heating of this item.

capacityHeatStorageHeatingNormal.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat storage heating capacity of this item.

capacityHeatStorageCooling.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat storage cooling capacity of this item.

capacityHeatStorageHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Heat storage heating capacity of this item.

capacityLowHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Low heating capacity of this item.

capacityLowHeatingCompressor.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Low heating compressor capacity of this item.

capacityRefrigeration.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Refrigeration capacity of this item.

classificationCode.description: Property. Classification code of this item.

combinationFlag.description: Property. combination flag of this item.

compressorOutput.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Cmpressor output of this item.

dateObjectCreated.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The registration date and time of this item as an object.

dateObjectUpdated.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The update date and time of this item as an object.

dryBulbTemperatureIndoorCooling.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indoor dry bulb temperature when cooling.

dryBulbTemperatureIndoorHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indoor dry bulb temperature when heating.

dryBulbTemperatureIndoorLowHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indoor dry bulb temperature when low heating.

dryBulbTemperatureOutdoorCooling.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Outdoor dry bulb temperature when cooling.

dryBulbTemperatureOutdoorHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Outdoor dry bulb temperature when heating.

dryBulbTemperatureOutdoorLowHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Outdoor dry bulb temperature when low heating.

exteriorShape.description: GeoProperty. Exterior shape of this item.

flagDeleted.description: Property. Flag set when this item is deleted as an object.

heatSourceWaterTemperatureCooling.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Water temperature of heat source when cooling of this item.

heatSourceWaterTemperatureHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Water temperature of heat source when heating of this item.

idModel.description: Property. Model id or number of this item.

mnetAddress.description: Property. Mnet address of this item.

motorOutput.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. fan motor output of this item.

objectName.description: Property. Name of this item as an object.

powerConsumptionCooling.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when cooling of this item.

powerConsumptionCoolingMax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Max power consumption when cooling of this item.

powerConsumptionCoolingMin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Min power consumption when cooling of this item.

powerConsumptionCoolingRegeneration.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when regeneration cooling of this item.

powerConsumptionHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when heating of this item.

powerConsumptionHeatingMax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Max power consumption when heating of this item.

powerConsumptionHeatingMin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Min power consumption when heating of this item.

powerConsumptionHeatingNonHeatStorage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when non-heat storage heating of this item.

powerConsumptionHeatingHeatStorage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when heat storage heating of this item.

powerConsumptionHeatStorage.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when heat storaging of this item.

powerConsumptionLowHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when low heating of this item.

powerConsumptionRegeneration.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power consumption when Regenerating of this item.

powerFrequency.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Power frequency of this item.

price.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Price of this item.

refElectricPowerEquipment.description: Relationship. Reference to the electric power equipment containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the electric power equipment containing this item.

refGatewayController.description: Relationship. Reference to the gateway controller containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the gateway controller containing this item.

refIndoorAirConditioner.description: Relationship. Reference to the indoor air conditioner containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the indoor air conditioner containing this item.

refOutdoorAirConditioner.description: Relationship. Reference to the outdoor air conditioner containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the outdoor air conditioner containing this item.

refOutdoorAirConditionerMeasurement.description: Relationship. Reference to the outdoor air conditioner measurement containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the outdoor air conditioner measurement containing this item.

refOutdoorAirConditionerMentenanceMeasur.description: Relationship. Reference to the outdoor air conditioner mentenance measurement containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the outdoor air conditioner mentenance measurement containing this item.

refOutdoorAirTreatingUnit.description: Relationship. Reference to the outdoor air treating unit containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the outdoor air treating unit containing this item.

refSensor.description: Relationship. Reference to the sensor containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the sensor containing this item.

refSpace.description: Relationship. Reference to the space containing this item.

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the space containing this item.

serialNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'.  Serial number of this item.

wetBulbTemperatureIndoorCooling.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Indoor wet bulb temperature when cooling.

wetBulbTemperatureOutdoorCooling.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Outdoor wet bulb temperature when cooling.

wetBulbTemperatureOutdoorHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Outdoor wet bulb temperature when heating.

wetBulbTemperatureOutdoorLowHeating.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Outdoor wet bulb temperature when low heating.
